channel.title: BM Website Design
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm just wondering, how did you (the devs) make the current BM website? The design is really nice, smooth animations and parallax scrolling put a wonderful bow on top. I'm looking around for a template for my own use, but I can't find any web design services that provide that nice of a design, and my last resort is of course just coding the site myself... but I'd rather not. Was it a service or did you folks make it yourself?
And to anyone else in the community, if you have your own website, what service did you use and why?
Thanks!

item.title: BM Website Design
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Josh Hubi would be the go to person for website information. He is a master!

Read full topic
